name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science

description.en: In this course, the student will gain practical research experience by applying themselves to a to concrete research work connected with the research at the chair for Security and Theoretical Computer Science (e.g., deriving a mathematical result, developing/implementing an algorithm/software, etc.) The direction and content of the project is agreed upon with a supervisor.
description.et: Kursusel omandatakse praktiline kogemus uurimustööst ühe konkreetse teoreetilise informaatika-alase töö osas Andmeturbe ja teaoreetilise informaatika õppetooli juures (nt matemaatilise tulemuste saamine, algoritmi / tarkvara väljatöötamine / rakendamine jne.) Projekti uurimissuund ja sisu lepitakse kokku juhendajaga.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to give students knowledge and skills for performing research in theoretical computer science and related areas. The students shall get an understanding how research is performed by applying themselves to concrete research work connected with the research at the chair for Security and Theoretical Computer Science (e.g., deriving a mathematical result, developing/implementing an algorithm/software, etc.)
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda üliõpilastele teadmisi ja oskusi uurimistööks teoreetilises informaatikas ja sellega seotud valdkondades. Üliõpilased kogevad, kuidas viiakse läbi uurimistööd Andmeturbe ja teoreetilise arvutiteaduse õppetooli juures ühe konkreetsete teadusteema raames (nt matemaatilise tulemuste saamine, algoritmi / tarkvara väljatöötamine / rakendamine jne)

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, the students will have learned:
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukal läbimisel on üliõpilane omandanud:

learning_outcomes.en: - to apply theoretical knowledge learned in lectures to a bigger research-related problem
learning_outcomes.et: - Kuidas rakendada loengukursustel omandatud teoreetilisi teadmisi suuremas uurimuslikus ülesandes.

learning_outcomes.en: - to interact with other researchers (e.g., their supervisor) and to communicate research problems and solutions
learning_outcomes.et: - Kuidas suhelda teiste uurimisrühma liikmetega (nt. juhendajaga) uurimustöö olemusest ja lahendustest.

learning_outcomes.en: - to work independently (but under the guidance of a supervisor) on an open-ended problem
learning_outcomes.et: - Töötada iseseisvalt (juhendaja suunamisel) lahtise ülesande lahendamisel.

description.et: The final grade is established based on the performance in the assigned project, written report, class presentation and participation in the meetings.
